name: Big Doc's Casino
effect: Public. Casino. Controller Reaction: Before hands are drawn during the Gambling Phase, all players must ante 1 additional or one less ghost rock - your choice (players can borrow from the bank but must repay immediately, as when borrowing for ante).

name: Blackjacks (Mon-Backed)
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:19 Noon: Target and boot one of your Blackjacks Dudes to gain 2 ghost rock. The Dude becomes Wanted. This action can be used any number of times per turn.

name: Collegium (Mon-Backed)
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:17 You have one additional Control Point for every Gadget in play with Gadget Difficulty higher than four.

name: Crawford Talmadge
effect: Huckster:1 Noon Pull: Target a Hex attached to a Huckster at the same location as Crawford. If the pull is greater than the value of the targeted Huckster, the hex card is now attached to Crawford. After nightfall, return the hex to the target (or Boot Hill if the target was aced).

name: Eureka?!?
effect: If "Eureka!" is in play, send it to its owner's Boot Hill. Attach Eureka! to the home of the player to your left. When Eureka! attaches to a player's home, the player discards one card from his or her Play hand. A player's maximum hand size is reduced by one while Eureka! is attached. If the player wins a shootout, Eureka! leaves and attaches to the next player on the left. Only one Eureka can be in play at a time - discard any subsequent copies.

name: Eye of the Storm
effect: No other events resolve this turn. Events are discarded or aced, normally. You get 1 ghost rock for each two events that are cancelled in this fashion. Ace this event.

name: Harrowed Kenny
effect: Non-unique. Harrowed. You may not bring Harrowed Kenny into play through normal means. Reaction: When a Kenny you control is aced, remove it from the game. Pay Harrowed Kenny's cost and Pull: If the pull is Black, put Harrowed Kenny into play at your home. This is the only way Kenny can become Harrowed.

name: Hit Me
effect: Reaction: Play before the gambling phase begins. You draw and discard an additional card when playing lowball for the gambling phase this turn. Ace this card.

name: Jack's Left Shooter
effect: Unique. Weapon. The Left Shooter can be attached to Black Jack without cost. Noon: Call out a dude at this location, even if your dude is booted. Your dude cannot use any other weapons for this Shootout except Jack's Right Shooter.

name: Joker
effect: This card can only be used for Draw hands and pulls. Ace this card after it is used. The Joker is a wildcard: the player who draws it determines its suit and value. You may not have more than two Jokers in a deck. This card does not count against your deck limit. This card was issued in Inquest Magazine

name: Law Dogs (Mon-Backed)
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:19 You get one Victory Point every time you put another player's Wanted dude into Jail, and every time you ace a Wanted dude who has more than one Influence.

name: Law Dogs- Mob Justice [Virtual card]
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:19 All your Dudes with "Deputy" in the title have their ghost rock cost and upkeep reduced by 1 (minimum 0). Reaction: Boot a Law Dog Dude you control when a wanted Dude moves to an in-town location. Target the wanted Dude and move him or her to another in-town location of your choice. (NOTE: This card was never printed, but freely offered by AEG as a PDF file. This card is legal for official play, and is included here for completeness sake.)

name: Lilith Vandekamp Exp.
effect: Experienced. Abomination. Vampire. Noon: Boot any number of your other dudes in Lilith Vandekamp's location. Lilith Vandekamp gains a +1 bullet or +2 value bonus until after Nightfall for each booting Dude.

name: Lost Angels - Guardian Angels [Virtual card]
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:17 All your Blessed gain +1 Influence and +3 Value Bonuses. Start the game with 3 different Cheatin'! Cards face down beneath your home, taken from outside your deck. Cheatin' Reaction: When an opponant reveals an illegal hand you may pay 1 ghost rock to play one of your home's Cheatin'! cards. That card is removed from the game after it is used. (NOTE:This card was designed, but never printed. It has been officially recognized as a promotional, and is legal for tournament play.)

name: Lucky Rabbit's Foot
effect: Reaction: Ace the Lucky Rabbit's Foot after Draw hands have been drawn but before they have been revealed for a shootout this Dude is in. Discard your Draw hand and draw another hand using all of the same bonuses to the number of cards drawn and discarded.

name: No Mas
effect: Reaction: Play immediately after an action card is resolved. Ace the action card and this card.

name: Readin' the Stars
effect: Reaction: Play this card when an Event is revealed during the Gambling Phase. The Event is not resolved this turn but is instead resolved next turn as if it had been revealed as part of the player's Gambling Phase draw. This does not affect the actual contents of that player's lowball hand.

name: Sioux Union (Mon-Backed)
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:18 Reaction: Instead of receiving your home's production during upkeep, you may get any one spirit or Sioux dude from your deck, show it to your opponents and put it in your hand. If you borrowed from the Bank during the Gambling Phase, you must be able to repay that ghost rock in order to use this action.

name: Start Again
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. All the cards in that player's Draw hand are sent to Boot Hill, but are not considered "aced." Those cards may not leave Boot Hill in any way until the end of the game. That player draws five new cards to form his or her new Draw hand. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

name: Stop the Presses
effect: Noon: Boot a Deed you control with the word "Dispatch" or "Gazette" in the title. Increase or decrease the Influence of any one Dude by 1 until after Nightfall.

name: Strange Days
effect: Pull: If the pull is less than or equal to the current Fear level, all Dudes with a value less than the pull are booted. Ace this card.

name: Sweetrock (Mon-Backed)
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:20 You cannot put into play or take control of a Dude from another Outfit if you already control a non-Sweetrock, non-Drifter Dude. You have +1 Control Point for each Strike that you control that has a current Production more than 5. When playing lowball during the Gambling Phase, draw an extra card, then discard a card.

name: The Agency (Mon-Backed)
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:17 You gain 1 Victory Point after Nightfall every time one of your Dudes aces a Terror in a shootout if the Terror has a value of 7 or more and ends the turn in Boot Hill.

name: The Flock (Mon-Backed)
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:19 Any strikes with Control Points are worth an extra Control Point while you control them.

name: The Maze Rats (Mon-Backed)
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:16 Your dudes may consider all strikes to be adjacent to your home. Noon: Boot one or more of your dudes at a strike you control. If the combined bullet rating of the dudes is higher than the production of the strike, you are considered the owner of the deed until the end of the game.

name: The Texas Rangers (Mon-Backed)
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:19 Noon: Target a Terror. Boot one of your Dudes in the same or adjacent location to call out the Terror. Reaction: Immediately before one of your Dudes moves or joins a posse, boot this card. The Dude can ignore all movement restrictions, and can join a posse at a non-adjacent location. All movement costs, such as booting, must still be paid.

name: Whateley Family Estate (Mon-Backed)
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:17 Noon: Boot one of your Hucksters who is at a location where a dude was aced this turn. Your dude's Huckster skill is permanently increased by one.
